messages.message:
Wanted to share something that I was able to figure out regarding running gRPC endpoints. So I was able to trigger them from a UI which helped in debugging

```go install github.com/fullstorydev/grpcui/cmd/grpcui@latest (http://github.com/fullstorydev/grpcui/cmd/grpcui@latest)
grpcui -plaintext localhost:8601 # Gives 127.0.0.1 link which can be opened on laptop browser```
I got 8600-8603 from core-platform logs although I'm not 100% sure it's correct. (SS1)
Thatâ€™s a good trick! Even better than grpcurl
